title: UDEMY TOP 10 WORDPRESS PLUGINS MUST HAVE FOR WORDPRESS WEBSITE T
description:
WordPress is the most popular Web Content Management
Systems in the world and it has over 60 million
websites built using WordPress CMS. Building a
WordPress website is just the beginning of a
website construction; protecting the website from
hacking, infested with malware and spam is a
daunting task

By the end of this course, you will be able to enhance the overall
functionality of your WordPress website

* Protect your website in real time from hackers, malware and
viruses
* Loads your web site under 3 seconds
* Implement a disaster recovery procedures for your website and
carry out a simulated recovery for your website
* Integrating Google Analytic APIs to your website
and track your website visitors
* Lock down A website if an intruder attempts to hack
your website
* Reconfigure PHP's mail function to ensure your
website's email more reliable
* Fight and prevent spam from automated bots
attacking your website
* Optimized your WordPress website and increased your website
visibility to Search Engines such as Google, Bing and Yahoo

This course aims for anyone who wants to learn WordPress
Plugins. That is, anyone who develops website using WordPress at
all level and WordPress end-user or a business owner who like
to quickly and effectively use top WordPress plugins without
spending days researching and testing the most
commonly used WordPress plugins

What are the requirements?

There are no special technical skills required for
this course and no programming experienced
required because I will walk you through the entire
process step-by-step

Finally, the student should have an existing WordPress web site
installed on a hosting provider or on your computer so that you
can carry out the plugins installation, configuration and
testing of the plugins
